short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple text to speech extension made by TSL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The best text to speech extension on the chrome market. Easy to use extension, just highlight the text you want to be spoken, click the extension then double-click on the speak button. 

Coming soon:
Translation: Text will be automatically translated and read in the language of your choosing.
